name: Brain Training: Quick Reaction
description:
Simple and innovative! A reaction training game that activates the brain!
Why don't you train your reflexes happily and expand your infinite possibilities?

If there is a free game that can "fun" train the reflexes that are asked in both sports and games in the gap time, it may help the player to improve their abilities. In order to realize such an idea, this application was developed by adding the following three features.

1.Various sounds and effects that will raise your mood
-Background music that boosts motivation
-Beautiful light laser effect when tapping is successful
-Sounds and visual effects that remind you of "awakening" that is activated when you succeed in a row

2.Simple gameplay
-Simply tap a randomly displayed target
-Tap only for the number written on the target
-Points will be deducted if you tap the number 0 or a part other than the target

3.Stage system where you can feel growth + α
-A total of 20 stages from easy to difficult
-The world view of the brain and the universe that enhances concentration


This app is recommended for people like this.
-Those who like simple games
-Those who want to activate their brain while enjoying the game
-Athletes who want to train their reflexes, dynamic vision and concentration
-Game users such as FPS / TPS
-Those who are looking for easy vision training
-Parents who want to have fun developing their children's ability to see
-Those who are concerned about the decrease in reaction rate due to aging


It is expected to speed up the following series of flows.
vision (cognition) → nerves → brain (command) → muscles that move the body (exercise)

All you have to do is quickly process the information obtained visually with your brain and repeat the reaction!
By continuing to play happily, everyone's reaction speed will increase!

Get your best performance with an innovative and simple brain training app!

Awaken the abilities that haven't been fully demonstrated yet and aim for the best in your history!
